name: Electivire
description: The Thunderbolt Pokémon. It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.

abilities.name: Motor Drive
abilities.description: When hit by an electric-type move, if not immune, this Pokémon's speed increases by 10 feet until the end of combat (up to a max of 50 additional feet).

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be put to sleep.
